Control Statement: Non-functional performance requirements, such as those relating to end-user experiences (e.g. average and maximum response times) are vital to assessing the overall health of an application. From the cost perspective, it's recommended to set a budget for extreme circumstances and indicate upper limit for cost (when it's not worth serving more traffic due to overall costs).
